docs.lead_paragraph: Tracing a history can be a misty affair: an attempt to elicit a neat and linear order from a shifting assortment of strangely clouded ''facts.'' In this case, however, the mist was a bit too literal.

headline.main: How A Turkish Blossom Enflamed the Dutch Landscape

docs.abstract: Michael Upchurch travel article on investigating history of tulip in the Netherlands; map; photo (special section, The Sophisticated Traveler) (part 2 of 2-part section) (L)
docs.snippet: Tracing a history can be a misty affair: an attempt to elicit a neat and linear order from a shifting assortment of strangely clouded ''facts.''    In this case, however, the mist was a bit too literal.
